name: Towards a Holistic Formalization of Ethereum's Economics
description: The implications of Ethereum's economic design are not well understood. Using the tools from macrofinance, we can illuminate potential equilibrium conditions detrimental to Ethereum's security objectives and design a more robust protocol.

speakers.name: Brett Palatiello
speakers.bio: Brett was previously a general partner and head of blockchain at Interplay managing early stage crypto investments. Prior to that, Brett was a partner and portfolio manager at two quantitative trading firms.
